attributes.action: better accommodate the erection of Amateur Radio antenna masts and towers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To provide reasonable accommodation for amateur radio service communications, particularly given their valuable contribution in times of national disaster, by allowing no ordinance, regulation, plan or any other action to restrict amateur radio antenna height to less than 65 feet above ground level, except where local authorise may impose necessary regulations to ensure the safety of the installation.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
